headline: Wynn Resorts Cyberattack And Lawsuit Put Cybersecurity And Valuation In Focus
summary: Wynn Resorts (NasdaqGS:WYNN) has been hit by a cyberattack linked to the ShinyHunters group. Hackers reportedly stole sensitive data from more than 800,000 current and former employees. The attackers demanded a reported US$1.5 million ransom in exchange for the data. A federal class action lawsuit now alleges Wynn failed to provide adequate cybersecurity safeguards and response. Wynn Resorts, a major casino and resort operator, sits at the intersection of hospitality, gaming, and digital...
